UDTNSim User Guide
==================

Urban Delay Tolerant Network Simulator (UDTNSim) is designed for researchers
to study the performance of Delay/Disruption Tolerant Networking (DTN)
protocols and mobility models in an urban setting. 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   mobilitymodels
   routingprotocols
